title: WTB: T206 Commons in SGC 30, 40, or 50!
author: lloydchristmas

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Commons in SGC 30, 40, or 50!
posts.post_content: Hi everyone, I was lucky enough to pick up two really nice commons from a board member and have the itch to start tackling this set. I'm looking for any SGC slabbed cards in grades 30, 40, or 50, provided they don't have any creasing or wrinkles for the most part. Please post scans of what you may have available or PM me, thanks!
